snippet.title: Vanguard Exiles Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The Vanguard Exiles Official Gameplay trailer is here! Designed by the legendary game designer and creator of Magic the Gathering, Richard Garfield, 'Vanguard Exiles' is The Tea Division's new entry into the auto battler genre. With dynamic gameplay that'll have you wanting more, it's easy to see how this entry into the genre is nothing short of revolutionary!

Download the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2910840/Vanguard_Exiles_Demo/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=videodescription&utm_campaign=demolaunch24
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2745490/Vanguard_Exiles/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=videodescription&utm_campaign=demolaunch24#game_area_purchase
